name: Reindeer Pudding Cups
description: Turn this easy dessert into a fun, holiday craft. Grab some supplies like small paper cups, tiny pom poms, googly eyes, crayons, and markers. Let kids design their own reindeer pudding cups.

ingredients.name: mini candy canes or mini pretzels

preparation:
1. In large bowl, vigorously whisk mix with milk until light and frothy, about 4 min. Refrigerate to set and chill, about 20 min.
  2. Meanwhile, draw, colour, or use your favourite craft tools to make faces on each cup.
  3. When ready to serve, stir pudding and then portion into cups. Tuck in candy canes or pretzels for the reindeer "ears".
